Room.Name: Lorian Parkway/Islandia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lorian Parkway and Islandia Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Lorian Parkway runs north from Islandia Drive, which runs east and west. On the south side of the road, you can see a pet store called Nicole's World of Animals, where a number of small pets and companions may be purchased. No one should be without a pet.
